resources.string: Please enter the email associated with your Notion account? We\'ll send instructions on how to reset your password to this address.
We\'ll start by creating an account for your system.
By creating an account, you agree with our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
Next, find a centrally located outlet in your home, and plug in your bridge.
Finally, you can install and use your sensors!
Use your phone\'s camera to add sensors to your Notion System.
If you go back you\'ll all of the information you\'ve set up so far.
First off, we\'d like to get your full name:
Oops, we need your first name.
Oops, we need your last name.
We\'ll send emails about alerts from your home, tips on how to get the most out of your system, and product offers.
Your email doesn\'t seem to be valid…
The number doesn\'t seem to be valid…
And, please create a password that\'s at least eight characters.
Oops, please make sure to use 8 characters.
An eloquent hand plugging in a Notion Bridge vertically into an outlet on a tile wall with a seemingly nice wooden countertop below
Go ahead and plug in your bridge. You\'ll see the light on the top flash blue when it\'s ready to be installed.
What would you like to name your new system?
Oops, your system must at least be 4 characters.
What would you like to call this system?
Please enter a valid system name!
Location permissions are required to connect and configure your Bridge. They\'re also used for setting the correct timezone for your System. \n(You can disable them upon completing setup)

Write Settings permissions are also required to configure your Bridge on Android v6.0.0 due to a system bug fixed in 6.0.1. A new screen will be launched to enable this permission. \n(You can disable this upon completing setup)
It doesn\'t look like your bridge is connected or in range. Please plug in near your wifi router and try again!
The following Bridge was self selected because it\'s the only one in range.
We found your Bridge! Now select your Wi-Fi network.
We found multiple bridges. Tap below to select a different one, and then select your Wi-Fi network.
Your password cannot be empty for the selected network type.

To wake up your sensor,
knock twice.
The light will flash when it\'s awake.
A big ole fist knocking on a Sensor.
Scan the QR code on the back of the sensor you would like to install.
The hind end of a sensor.
Oops, you\'ve already added this sensor to the system. Please try a different sensor..
Sensor ID won\'t scan? Please contact Notion Support for additional methods of determining your Sensor\'s ID and enter it below.
What room will you be putting your sensor in?
Where would you like to move this sensor?
What would you like to name the location where you\'re placing your sensor?
You already have a sensor in the %s, what new name would you like to use for this location?
What would you like to name this location?
Select the tasks you\'d like to assign to the %s. Tasks that are in conflict will be shuffled to the bottom of the list.
If not, please close your door.
If not, please close your garage door.
If not, please close your window.
Install no more than 12 in. away.
This allows the Notion Sensor to tell when a smoke or carbon monoxide alarm is activated.
Does your window slide vertically or horizontally?
Does your window open vertically or horizontally?
This helps us calibrate the sensor.
Choose the type of window you\'re installing on.
This helps us calibrate the sensor.
Attach the sensor on your door.
Peel the clear sticker backing off the sensor. Place it on the inside of your door, on the side of the door knob, at the top of the door.
Attach the sensor on your sliding door.
Peel the clear sticker backing off the sensor. Place it on the inside of the door that slides, at the top of the door.
Attach the sensor to your garage door.
Peel the clear sticker backing off the sensor. Place it on the inside of the garage door at the top of the door.
Clean the area the sensor will be placed before adhering to the door.
Attach the sensor to your safe door.
Peel the clear sticker backing off the sensor. Place the sensor on the opposite side of the safe door hinges, at the top of the door.
Attach the sensor to a window.
Peel the clear sticker backing off the sensor. Place the sensor on the glass of the window that moves when opened.
Place the sensor near the window\'s handle.
Attach within a few inches of your smoke alarm.
Peel the clear sticker backing off the sensor. Place the sensor in a well ventilated area on the wall or ceiling your alarm is on.
Sensors may have a tough time sticking to rough or bumpy walls or ceilings.
Attach the sensor to the floor or wall.
Peel the clear sticker backing off the sensor. Place the sensor in an area you\'re concerned water might collect.
Clean the area to remove any dust and dirt before installing.
Place the sensor on a dresser, table, bookshelf, or flat surface or adhere to a wall or ceiling of the room you want to monitor.
Sensors may have a tough time sticking to rough or bumpy walls or ceilings.
Have a good day at work.
You don\'t seem to have any tasks. \\n You can add one using the button below.
When would you like to receive alerts?
What temperatures would you like to be notified about?
You don\'t seem to have any tasks. \n You can add one using the button below.
Below is the last 7 days that had activity for your %s
Tip: Changing location will affect all tasks associated with this sensor.
Send an alert when low battery
Add a contact to share alerts.
You don\'t seem to have any systems. \n You can add one using the button below.
What would you like to call this system?
You don\'t seem to have any sensors. \n You can add one using the button below.
You don\'t seem to have an active System. \n You must first create a system before adding Sensors \n Tap here to add one from System Settings.
It looks like you have %1$s more %2$s to install?
Task alerts will be sent immediately by email while notifications are off.
Edit the start and end of your night mode:
You don\'t seem to have any bridges. \n You can add one using the button below.
These numbers are based on the location of your system. They will be automatically updated if you change your location.
I don\'t see my bridge listed…
Manually connect to the Bridge in question, fill in the details below, and the EZ Bridge Provisioner 8001 handles the rest!
Security: (0 - No Security, 1 - WEP, 4 - WPA2, 5 - WPA/WPA2 Mixed)
Add a location of your own
Click to raise the temperature value
Click to lower the temperature value
A nice dark teal circle with a pleasant white check mark centered within it.
We\'ll send an email to your account welcoming you to Notion.
Now the fun part. Adding some sensors!
Check it out in the Bridge list in System Settings {fa-cog}.
When solid green, the Notion Bridge is connected to the internet.
Installing your sensor within 20ft of your bridge will ensure optimal connectivity.
If you go back, all of the information you\'ve added will be lost.
If you log out, you won\'t have access to your account on this device without logging back in.
Error requesting a password reset. Please try again.
Please ensure your Bridge is plugged in and connected to your Wi-Fi (displaying a solid green light).
Please knock on your sensor to wake it up, and try again.
Calibration is taking longer than expected. Hold tight, and please try again.
Have you attached the sensor as per the instructions?
We noticed your WiFi network security is set to WEP. Please refer to our Knowledge Base for assistance.
We were unable to provision your bridge. Please verify your network credentials and try again.
We were unable to configure your Bridge. Please try again.
We were unable to connect to your Bridge. Please try again, or manually connect to it via WiFi Settings and try again.
We were unable to connect your Bridge to your WiFi network. Please double check your credentials and try again.
Please select a location to continue.
Your bridge was configured, but we failed to create your System with Notion. Please try again.
Your bridge was configured, but we failed to add it to your System. Please try again.
The following error occurred when attempting to update your night time settings:
When you delete a system, you\'ll lose all associated sensors, tasks, and data.
The following error occurred when attempting to delete your system:
When you delete a sensor, you\'ll lose all associated tasks and data.
The following error occurred when attempting to delete your sensor:
When you delete a task, you\'ll lose all associated data.
The following error occurred when attempting to delete your task:
If you delete this bridge, your sensors may stop reporting data properly.
The following error occurred when attempting to delete your bridge:
Would you like to unselect all current selections and start over?
Camera permissions are required to continue. Please go into App Settings and enable to continue.
Contact permissions are required to continue. Please go into App Settings and enable to continue.
Location permissions are required to continue. Please go into App Settings and enable to continue.
It looks like your device wasn\'t able to automatically disconnect from the Bridge. Please reconnect to your wi-fi and try again.
Bridge already exists on another account.
